attributes.action: Designate a new UK national holiday as ‘NHS Day’ to give thanks for our NHS.
attributes.additional_details: As a national, cross-party recognition for the efforts of our amazing NHS. To show unity in the face of the pandemic and its lasting economic and social effects to come. To provide a focus to remember all that have died from the disease, but in a positive manner.
attributes.background: Pass a law to designate a new NHS Day national holiday. The first of which would come into affect following the downgrading of pandemic status.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
